{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Fyrna |image = Portrait_Orlan_Peddler_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Fyrna.png |caption = |race = Orlan |subrace = Hearth |gender = Female |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 4 |MIG = 14 |CON = 10 |DEX = 16 |PER = 17 |INT = 10 |RES = 11 |health = 70 |damage = 13-18 {{slash}} |accuracy = 57 |penetration = 8 |deflection = 30 |fortitude = 32 |reflex = 65 |will = 31 |dr = 3 |ability = [Minor Threat](/minorThreatDeadfire/), [Sneak Attack](/sneakAttackDeadfire/), [Defensive Roll](/defensiveRoll/), [Escape](/escapeDeadfire/), [Blinding Strike](/blindingStrikeDeadfire/), [Dirty Fighting](/dirtyFightingDeadfire/) |location = [The Gullet](/theGullet/), [The Hole](/theHole/) |quests = [Delver's Row (quest)](/delversRowQuest/)
[The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/) |sells = Food, drink, and rooms |resting = yes |adventurers = yes |companion = |loot = |body = Roparu Clothing |weapon1 = Fine Dagger (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Dagger |internalname = NPC_SD_Tender_Toko |guid = 71809218-ec23-40c3-9c84-e80886e0860b }} '''Fyrna''' is a character in {{poe2}}. __NOTOC__ ## Background {{Description|An orlan covered toe to ear tip in sable fur leans against the bar counting change. She gives you a wide, easy smile when she notices your approach, then slips the coins into her pocket with a wink.}} Fyrna is the hardy owner of the Hole with a variety of tales to tell about how she come to possess such a fine piece of real estate. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = Food, drink, and rooms. |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Delver's Row (quest)](/delversRowQuest/)
[The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/) |none = |other = }} ## =Rooms = * Stowaway Stay (free) * Forger's Fancy ({{cp2|100}}): +2 [Stealth](/stealth/), [Streetwise](/streetwise/), and [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/). ## =Quests = * [Delver's Row (quest)](/delversRowQuest/): She can reveal the location if your reputation with the Gullet is at least 1. * [The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/): Points you in the direction of the pirates who hauled [Giacolo](/giacolo/) away. [Category:The Hole characters](/categoryTheHoleCharacters/) [Category:The Gullet characters](/categoryTheGulletCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Fyrna |image = Portrait_Orlan_Peddler_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Fyrna.png |caption = |race = Orlan |subrace = Hearth |gender = Female |culture = [[Deadfire Archipelago]] |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 4 |MIG = 14 |CON = 10 |DEX = 16 |PER = 17 |INT = 10 |RES = 11 |health = 70 |damage = 13-18 {{slash}} |accuracy = 57 |penetration = 8 |deflection = 30 |fortitude = 32 |reflex = 65 |will = 31 |dr = 3 |ability = [[Minor Threat (Deadfire)|Minor Threat]], [[Sneak Attack (Deadfire)|Sneak Attack]], [[Defensive Roll]], [[Escape (Deadfire)|Escape]], [[Blinding Strike (Deadfire)|Blinding Strike]], [[Dirty Fighting (Deadfire)|Dirty Fighting]] |location = [[The Gullet]], [[The Hole]] |quests = [[Delver's Row (quest)]]
[[The Man of Chimes]] |sells = Food, drink, and rooms |resting = yes |adventurers = yes |companion = |loot = |body = Roparu Clothing |weapon1 = Fine Dagger (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Dagger |internalname = NPC_SD_Tender_Toko |guid = 71809218-ec23-40c3-9c84-e80886e0860b }} '''Fyrna''' is a character in {{poe2}}. __NOTOC__ ==Background== {{Description|An orlan covered toe to ear tip in sable fur leans against the bar counting change. She gives you a wide, easy smile when she notices your approach, then slips the coins into her pocket with a wink.}} Fyrna is the hardy owner of the Hole with a variety of tales to tell about how she come to possess such a fine piece of real estate. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = Food, drink, and rooms. |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Delver's Row (quest)]]
[[The Man of Chimes]] |none = |other = }} ===Rooms=== * Stowaway Stay (free) * Forger's Fancy ({{cp2|100}}): +2 [[Stealth]], [[Streetwise]], and [[Sleight of Hand]]. ===Quests=== * [[Delver's Row (quest)]]: She can reveal the location if your reputation with the Gullet is at least 1. * [[The Man of Chimes]]: Points you in the direction of the pirates who hauled [[Giacolo]] away. [[Category:The Hole characters]] [[Category:The Gullet characters]]
title: Fyrna
